dt: {bc}the starchy or mucilaginous dried tubers of various Old World orchids (especially genus {it}Orchis{/it}) used for food or in medicine

et: French or Spanish, both from Arabic dialect {it}saḥlab{/it}, perhaps alteration of Arabic ({it}khuṣy al-{/it}){it}thaʽlab{/it}, literally, testicles of the fox
shortdef: the starchy or mucilaginous dried tubers of various Old World orchids (especially genus Orchis) used for food or in medicine
